name: cool_steel

refinement_effect.refine_one: Increases DMG against enemies affected by Hydro or Cryo by 12%.
refinement_effect.refine_two: Increases DMG against enemies affected by Hydro or Cryo by 15%.
refinement_effect.refine_three: Increases DMG against enemies affected by Hydro or Cryo by 18%.
refinement_effect.refine_four: Increases DMG against enemies affected by Hydro or Cryo by 21%.
refinement_effect.refine_five: Increases DMG against enemies affected by Hydro or Cryo by 24%.

description: A reliable steel-forged weapon that serves as a testament to the great adventures of its old master.
